parameters.name: options.src
parameters.description: The URL of the audio file to be loaded.

parameters.name: options.loop
parameters.description: Whether the audio should start over again when it reaches the end. Default: false

parameters.name: options.volume
parameters.description: The volume level, ranging from 0.0 to 1.0. Default: 1.0

returnValues.name: audio
returnValues.description: The underlying native audio instance for advanced direct manipulation.

returnValues.name: error
returnValues.description: Contains an error object if the audio fails to load or play.

returnValues.name: pause
returnValues.description: Function to pause the current playback.

returnValues.name: play
returnValues.description: Async function to start playback; handles the browser's play promise.

returnValues.name: status
returnValues.description: Reactive string representing the current state: 'idle', 'loading', etc.
